items.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra to come with new lens to combat flare
items.summary: We've heard a few rumors about the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra's camera system, and the latest, coming out of China, claims Samsung will address some camera issues with its upcoming flagship. We are referring to a post by popular tipster Ice Universe on Weibo. It is in Chinese, and machine translationâ€¦

items.title: Free speechâ€™s great leap backwards
items.summary: In early December, Joshua Aaron, the developer behind the ICEBlock app - designed to let people alert others about the presence of Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agents - filed a federal lawsuit alleging his First Amendment rights were violated. The Department of Justice had urged Apple â€¦

items.title: Kavanagh promoted to Uefa elite list of referees
items.summary: Chris Kavanagh has been promoted to the elite list of Uefa referees alongside Michael Oliver and Anthony Taylor.

items.title: Open source project brings 53-year-old interface to USB â€” GPIB adapter v3 adds integrated Ethernet port with PoE
items.summary: An open source USB to GPIB adapter will soon reach version 3, bringing an integrated Ethernet port with PoE support.

items.title: Why has Littler been booed at World Championship?
items.summary: BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team explains why world number one Luke Littler has been booed at the PDC World Darts Championship.

items.title: Tottenham sign Sweden defender Wijk

items.title: Women shouldn't be scared to discuss periods - Hartley
items.summary: Former England spinner Alex Hartley says women "shouldn't be scared to talk about their periods" after criticism of her discussing the topic on BBC Test Match Special.

items.summary: Nostalgia addicts can now get their Unix v4 fix in a browser

items.title: Right-back Altena to join Hearts from Waalwijk
